milestone_details: Day 1 period marks the start of a new cycle.
Blood test to check baseline hormones to prepare for stims.
Start stimulation medication
Blood test checks hormone levels to track stim medication and rising estradiol and LH.
A transvaginal probe is used to measure follicle sizes, count developing eggs, and check endometrial thickness for optimal timing.
Antagonist injections are introduced to block premature LH surges, preventing early ovulation while follicles continue maturing.
Trigger injection ensures ovulation occurs at the right time.
Egg retrieval uses a needle guided by ultrasound to aspirate mature eggs from ovarian follicles under light sedation.
Embryo is placed into your uterus.
Embryos are frozen using vitrification (flash-freezing with cryoprotectants) preserving them for future transfer.
Checks hCG levels to see if the embryo implanted successfully.
Day 1 period marks the start of a new cycle.
Blood checks hormone levels for timed insemination.
Blood test checks hormone levels.
Ultrasound checks lining and follicle growth.
Trigger injection ensures ovulation occurs at the right time.
Prepared sperm is placed into uterus to meet egg.
Progesterone supports the uterine lining.
Checks hCG levels to see if the embryo implanted successfully.
Day 1 period marks the start of a new cycle.
Blood test checks hormone levels.
Ultrasound checks lining and follicle growth.
Ovulation is detected and egg is released or triggered.
Progesterone supports the uterine lining.
Thawed embryo is placed into your uterus.
Checks hCG levels to see if the embryo implanted successfully.
Day 1 period marks the start of a new cycle.
Blood test to check baseline hormones to prepare for stims.
Start stimulation medication
Blood test checks hormone levels.
A transvaginal probe is used to measure follicle sizes, count developing eggs, and check endometrial thickness for optimal timing.
Antagonist injections are introduced to block premature LH surges, preventing early ovulation while follicles continue maturing.
Trigger injection ensures ovulation occurs at the right time.
Egg retrieval uses a needle guided by ultrasound to aspirate mature eggs from ovarian follicles under light sedation.
Eggs are safely frozen using vitrification (flash-freezing with cryoprotectants) preserving them for future use.
